item.title: CGIAR Library Migration
item.description: Rough notes for importing the CGIAR Library content. It was decided that this content would go to a new top-level community called CGIAR System Organization. Pre-migration Technical TODOs Things that need to happen before the migration: Create top-level community on CGSpace to hold the CGIAR Library content: 10568/83389 Update nginx redirects in ansible templates Update handle in DSpace XMLUI config Set up nginx redirects for URLs like: https://library.cgiar.org/bitstream/handle/10947/2699/CGIAR_Branding_Guidelines_and_Toolkit.pdf https://library.
